casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

November 3, 2009

[Cite as 11/03/2009 Case Announcements #2, 2009-Ohio-5776.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-1624. In re Smith.

Allen App. No. 1-07-58, 2008-Ohio-3234. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Allen County. Upon consideration of the motion of amici curiae The Justice for Children Project et al. to realign as neutral amici and motion to participate in oral argument on November 4, 2009,

It is ordered by the court that the motions are denied.
